data.lyric:
[ti:Drunk Me]
[ar:Mitchell Tenpenny]
[al:Mitchell Tenpenny]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Drunk Me - Mitchell Tenpenny
[00:03.71]Lyrics by：Mitchell Tenpenny/Jordan Schmidt/Justin Wilson
[00:07.43]Composed by：Jordan Schmidt/Mitchell Tenpenny/Justin Wilson
[00:11.14]Some people don't know when to quit
[00:14.49]And that's why they quit
[00:16.69]Some need to hit the bottom to see they got a problem
[00:19.94]They can't handle it
[00:21.74]But that ain't why I started cleaning up my life
[00:27.18]Wish it was but ooh
[00:30.67]That would be a lie
[00:32.66]I've been sober 'cause there ain't no hangover like you girl
[00:41.54]No no no
[00:43.36]Baby can you come over
[00:46.28]I always find those words at the bottom of a hundred proof
[00:50.74]Yeah
[00:52.19]Girl every time you do
[00:54.53]I just end up head all messed up
[00:57.38]Like the sheets where we made love
[01:00.17]I've been sober since you broke my heart in two
[01:05.89]'Cause drunk me can't get over you
[01:09.23]There ain't no hangover like you
[01:11.90]Can't get over can't get over
[01:14.50]There ain't no hangover like you
[01:16.85]Oh no no no
[01:19.30]All those bottles sitting up on
[01:20.96]The shelf are just salt on the wound
[01:24.95]One sip and I'm picking up the phone
[01:26.92]Trying not to go home without you
[01:29.82]And that ain't nothing but a whole lotta pain
[01:35.34]And that kind of hurt ooh hurts
[01:38.35]It ain't worth another drink
[01:40.81]I've been sober 'cause there ain't no hangover like you
[01:48.05]Girl
[01:49.91]No no no
[01:51.55]Baby can you come over
[01:54.44]I always find those words at the bottom of a hundred proof
[01:58.94]Yeah
[02:00.52]Girl every time you do I just end up
[02:04.26]Head all messed up like the sheets where we made love
[02:08.39]I've been sober since you broke my heart in two
[02:13.90]'Cause drunk me can't get over you no
[02:21.47]Can't get over you oh no no no
[02:27.71]I've been sober 'cause there ain't no hangover like you
[02:33.98]No no no
[02:36.08]No no no
[02:38.39]Can you come over
[02:40.79]I always find those words at the bottom of a hundred proof
[02:45.01]Yeah
[02:47.31]Girl every time you do I just end up
[02:50.55]Head all messed up like the sheets where we made love
[02:54.62]I've been sober since you broke my heart in two
[03:00.38]'Cause drunk me yeah drunk me yeah drunk me
[03:05.92]Yeah drunk me
[03:10.18]Can't get over you no
[03:11.99]There ain't no hangover like you
[03:14.63]Can't get over can't get over
[03:17.18]There ain't no hangover like you
[03:19.08]Oh no no no
data.trans:
[ti:Drunk Me]
[ar:Mitchell Tenpenny]
[al:Mitchell Tenpenny]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:03.71]//
[00:07.43]//
[00:11.14]有些人不知道什么时候该放弃
[00:14.49]这就是他们放弃的原因
[00:16.69]有些人需要经历人生低谷才会明白他们遇到了麻烦
[00:19.94]他们无能为力
[00:21.74]但这不是我开始清理自己生活的原因
[00:27.18]真希望如此但是
[00:30.67]那就是谎言
[00:32.66]我一直很清醒因为我不像你一样宿醉
[00:41.54]不不不
[00:43.36]宝贝你能否来到我身边
[00:46.28]我总是在最底下找到那些话
[00:50.74]是
[00:52.19]姑娘每当你这样做
[00:54.53]结果我的脑袋一片混乱
[00:57.38]就像我们缠绵的被窝
[01:00.17]自从你把我的心撕成两半之后我就一直清醒着
[01:05.89]因为喝醉了我无法忘记你
[01:09.23]没有人像你一样宿醉未醒
[01:11.90]无法释怀无法释怀
[01:14.50]没有人像你一样宿醉未醒
[01:16.85]不不不
[01:19.30]酒瓶放着
[01:20.96]就像伤口上撒盐
[01:24.95]浅尝一口我就拿起电话
[01:26.92]我不想回家的时候没有你
[01:29.82]那不过是无尽的痛苦
[01:35.34]那种伤害
[01:38.35]不值得再喝一杯
[01:40.81]我一直很清醒因为我没有像你一样宿醉
[01:48.05]女孩
[01:49.91]不不不
[01:51.55]宝贝你能否来到我身边
[01:54.44]我总是在最底下找到那些话
[01:58.94]是
[02:00.52]女孩每当你这样做我都会结束
[02:04.26]脑袋一片混乱就像我们缠绵的床单
[02:08.39]自从你把我的心撕成两半之后我就一直清醒着
[02:13.90]因为喝醉了我无法忘记你
[02:21.47]我无法忘记你
[02:27.71]我一直很清醒因为我没有像你一样宿醉
[02:33.98]不不不
[02:36.08]不不不
[02:38.39]你能过来吗
[02:40.79]我总是在最底下找到那些话
[02:45.01]是
[02:47.31]女孩每当你这样做我都会结束
[02:50.55]脑袋一片混乱就像我们缠绵的床单
[02:54.62]自从你把我的心撕成两半之后我就一直清醒着
[03:00.38]因为让我沉醉
[03:05.92]让我沉醉
[03:10.18]我无法忘记你
[03:11.99]没有人像你一样宿醉未醒
[03:14.63]无法释怀无法释怀
[03:17.18]没有人像你一样宿醉未醒
[03:19.08]不不不
